Package Controller

Class ModifyApptController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ModifyApptController
public class ModifyApptController extends Object
Controller class for viewing in a tableview and modifying appointments Including adding, deleting, and updating appointments

      public void initializeUpdateAppt(Appointments appointments)
      Initializes fields in Update Appointment tab with values from existing appointment
      Parameters:
      appointments - The appointment whose details are to be loaded into the fields for update.

    • populateContactCombo

      public void populateContactCombo()
      Populates contact ComboBox with all contact names. Uses a lambda expression to iterate over contacts list and add each contact name to ComboBox.

      Parameters:

    • hasOverlappingAppointment

      public boolean hasOverlappingAppointment(int customerId, LocalDateTime updatedStart, LocalDateTime updatedEnd, int appointmentIdToExclude)
      Checks for overlapping appointments considering both customer and contact IDs.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      updatedStart - The start time of the new/updated appointment.
      updatedEnd - The end time of the new/updated appointment.
      appointmentIdToExclude - The ID of the appointment to exclude from the overlap check.
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlapping appointment, false otherwise.
